channel.description: Recent content in shortcodes on offetuoso's Blog

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. Instagram Simple Shortcode YouTube Privacy Enhanced Shortcode $ hugo Twitter Simple Shortcode “In addition to being more logical, asymmetry has the advantage that its complete appearance is far more optically effective than symmetry.” — Jan Tschichold pic.twitter.com/gcv7SrhvJb
